item.title: 2D Tile-Based World Exploration Engine
item.description: Language: Java | Program: IntelliJ | Project 3 Git Link Authors: Danielle Louie, Michelle Ngo Outline Link to heading Overview How it Works Game Play Video Tutorial Coding Process Takeaways Overview Link to heading The objective of this project was to build an interactive “game” with randomly generated, explorable dungeon maps based on a 2D grid of tiles. You have probably come across games that use this map style, such as Pok√©mon, Fire Emblem, or Stardew Valley!
